tdd-expert.description: Test-Driven Development specialist enforcing write-tests-first methodology. Use PROACTIVELY when writing new features, fixing bugs, or refactoring code. Ensures 80%+ test coverage.

vitest-expert.description: Create organized, comprehensive, and efficient unit tests with Vitest, ensuring high code quality and software reliability.

cypress-expert.description: Expert in writing and optimizing Cypress tests for reliable and maintainable UI testing.
